title: The Battle of Midway
creator_contributor_role: United States. Dept. of the Navy, production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945 - Pacific Area
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Academy awards (Motion pictures)
description: Episode number 8 of Series "Why we fight". John Ford's Academy Award winning documentary filmed during the Battle of Midway. Narration combines with visuals of the naval air battle, hospitalization of the injured and burial services in a patriotic tribute to the people from the United States battling the Japanese. Suitable for Tertiary level students.
related_objects: Series; S00934; Why we fight; Active; 1942
